law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 11, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 2, effective June 20, 2005; ch. 85, sec. 522, effective June 20, 2005; ch. 99, sec. 20, effective June 20, 2005; and ch. 120, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 101, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 3, effective August 1, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 96, effective July 15, 1994.
